physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 4 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: "#464 Gus Cohen family of Guffey." On back of photograph: "Gus Cohen, Married to Louise (Laura) Goldburg & parents of Cohen boys, #464." On front of photograph: "Guffey, Colo."

mods.abstract: Gus Cohen stands in front of the Post Office in Guffey, Colorado where he served as the postmaster and a justice of the peace.
